snippet.title: [WAB] Gameplay Walkthrought #1
snippet.description:
First attempt gameplay walkthrough for Drift Into Eternity. Day 0 to Day 3... good luck galactic handyman!

D.I.E is a futuristic survival  game in which you embody a crewmember of a distress spaceship, crashed on an unknown and unfriendly planet. You're alone. Desperatly alone.
Observe, Study, Explore... and maybe you'll linger on.
_______________________________________

Twitter : https://twitter.com/BotsWeAre
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/wabstudio/
Site : http://www.wearebots.fr/
